title: How to find music video by description - Quora

response.answer_text: There is this music video I can’t find that is in korean/japanese girl group that contains either 4 or 5 girls. The video goes as all of them are dancing through the song and as the video shows that in a quick look they are each covered in black cloth and in another look but this time its long they each are placed in a certain room in the same hotel like one is in the elevator another is in a hallway. But they all meet the same boy but he is not korean/japanese he looks english. As the boy keeps staring at each other he goes near to each of them and kisses them as they get kissed the black cloths them are removed on the girls that were covered.

This is quite memorable, close to the description, but doesn’t contain ‘strong’ !Olivia Newton-John - Physical[1]  I suspect the imagery was aimed to deflect censors from a possible sexual overtone or undertone in the lyrics? Footnotes[1] Physical (Olivia Newton-John song) - Wikipedia
